typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_accountid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_accountid as string,
		name as string,
		ownerid as string,
		orignatingleadid as string,
		renevue as decimal(19,4),
		numberofemployees as integer,
		territoryid as string,
		industrycode as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
source(output(
		SK_accountid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		name as string,
		ownerid as integer,
		orignatingleadid as integer,
		renevue as decimal(19,4),
		numberofemployees as integer,
		territoryid as integer,
		industrycode as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWH
STG derive(STGHASH = crc32(512,upper(toString(ownerid)),toString(modifiedon),toString(name),toInteger(toString(renevue),'############'),toString(numberofemployees),toString(industrycode),upper(toString(orignatingleadid)),upper(toString(territoryid)))) ~> STGHASH
STGHASH, DWH lookup(STG@SK_accountid == DWH@SK_accountid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(STG@HASHKEY),
	STGHASH!=STG@HASHKEY,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_accountid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		name as string,
		ownerid as integer,
		orignatingleadid as integer,
		renevue as decimal(19,4),
		numberofemployees as integer,
		territoryid as integer,
		industrycode as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HASHKEY = STGHASH,
		name = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@name,
		ownerid = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@ownerid,
		orignatingleadid = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@orignatingleadid,
		renevue = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@renevue,
		numberofemployees = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@numberofemployees,
		territoryid = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@territoryid,
		industrycode = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@industrycode,
		modifiedon = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@modifiedon,
		createdon = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@createdon
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_accountid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		name as string,
		ownerid as integer,
		orignatingleadid as integer,
		renevue as decimal(19,4),
		numberofemployees as integer,
		territoryid as integer,
		industrycode as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SK_accountid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SK_accountid = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@SK_accountid,
		HASHKEY = STGHASH,
		name = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@name,
		ownerid = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@ownerid,
		orignatingleadid = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@orignatingleadid,
		renevue = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@renevue,
		numberofemployees = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@numberofemployees,
		territoryid = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@territoryid,
		industrycode = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@industrycode,
		modifiedon = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@modifiedon,
		createdon = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@createdon
	)) ~> sink2
